title: FS: Cycle, Tolstoi, Sovereign w/ Huggins
author: DerekMichael

posts.post_title: FS: Cycle, Tolstoi, Sovereign w/ Huggins
posts.post_content:
Hi All.

I have a small batch of VERY well loved T206 with a couple of interesting backs, and some decent players.

Miller Huggins- hands at mouth (HOF) ... Cycle 350
Cy Seymour- portrait ... Tolstoi
Doc White- portrait ... Sovereign 350
(2) Bill Carrigan ... Sovereign 350

I prefer to just sell them as one batch for $200 or so, and I will cover shipping expenses, but if that does not materialize, we discuss individual cards.

Thank You.

Derek

Doc White and the Carrigan on the left are SOLD.

The other three can be found in a net54 auction here:

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?p=1171568#post1171568[/url]

Thank You Very Much.

Derek
